definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.chinese: 白內障會影響你的視力。

sentences.english: The first importand task in blindness prevention still is the dlimination of cataract blindness.
sentences.chinese: 防盲工作的首要任務仍是根治白內障盲。

sentences.english: Cataracts can cause blurry vision and increase the glare from lights.
sentences.chinese: 白內障可引起視物模糊以及眩光。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the technique of phacoemulsification with hard nucleolus cataract.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討硬核白內障超聲乳化的手術技巧。

sentences.english: A disc problem in the back, more heart trouble, a lens implant for cataracts.
sentences.chinese: 背部椎間盤問題，心臟問題，白內障晶體移植。

sentences.english: To study effect of 3 kinds of Incisions on early astigmatism after cataract surgery.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究3種白內障手術切口對術後早期散光的影響。

sentences.english: Aging and exposure to sunlight can cause cataracts.
sentences.chinese: 衰老和日光照射可引起白內障。

sentences.english: Children are sometimes born with cataracts that need to be removed.
sentences.chinese: 一些兒童天生就患有白內障，這是一定要摘除的。

sentences.english: The cases of B group were aspirated the lens with only posterior continuous curvilinear capsulorhexis (PCCC).
sentences.chinese: 組僅用白內障抽吸聯合後囊環形撕開術。

sentences.english: If you let your eyes exposed to the sun too much you can get cataracts at a young age.
sentences.chinese: 你如果讓你的眼睛太常暴露陽光就可能會得白內障。

sentences.english: Nexus - information on refractive and cataract surgery, corneal topography and topographers.
sentences.chinese: 屈光矯正，白內障手術，角膜地形圖的有關信息。

sentences.english: Because he had a disease named congenital cataracts . he cann't go to school .
sentences.chinese: 因爲他先天性白內障，看不清文字，也無法拿筆。

sentences.english: Tens of thousands of people receive the surgery every year in Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 在香港，每年有超一萬人接受白內障手術。

sentences.english: Fig. 4 The intramembranous particles in fibrocell's cytomembrane reduced in cataract group.
sentences.chinese: 圖4白內障組大鼠晶狀體纖維細胞膜膜內顆粒減少。

definition: dry eye/xerophthalmia (drying of the tear glands, often due to lack of vitamin A)
to become cancerous/transformation to malignancy (of body cells)
